Subcommittee on Asian and Pacific Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit any person from exporting from the United States any currency directly or indirectly to any person in Vietnam.

summary.text: Prohibits exporting any currency, directly or indirectly, to any person in Vietnam. Sets forth penalties for violations of this Act. Authorizes the President to suspend the provisions of this Act if the President determines that the Government of Vietnam is returning to Vietnam those Vietnamese nationals who were sent against their will to other communist countries.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit any person from exporting from the United States any currency directly or indirectly to any person in Vietnam.
